main event: Three witnesses observed a cigar-shaped object near Miamisburg, Ohio that maneuvered back and forth for several minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared to be very small and very high, reflecting the sun at times and giving the impression it was spinning very slowly.
The object remained stationary for several minutes at a time and alternately went from bright to dull, suggesting it was rotating.
The object did not make any sudden or quick movements.
One witness compared the object's appearance to that of a high-altitude small jet plane.
The sighting lasted for around 15-18 minutes.
